action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

Your goal for this game is: Put the pillow on the counter, the book on the shelf and the plate on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> take pillow from broom closet  
(Note: Since the pillow is not mentioned in the initial description, this action assumes it is present in the closet. If not, the next logical step would be to explore the hallway for the pillow.)<|im_end|>
Turn 1
You are not in a broomcloset.

> go to hallway  
(Note: This action is to explore the hallway for the pillow, book, and plate as they are not mentioned in the broom closet.)<|im_end|>
Turn 2
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a broom closet and a kitchen here.

> go to bedroom  
(Note: This action is to explore the bedroom for the pillow, book, and plate.)<|im_end|>
Turn 3
You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe, a shelf and a bed. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> open wardrobe  
(Note: This action is to check the wardrobe for the pillow, book, or plate.)<|im_end|>
Turn 4
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there is a pillow.

> take pillow from wardrobe  
(Note: This action is to take the pillow, which is part of the goal.)<|im_end|>
Turn 5
You take the pillow. In your inventory you have a pillow.

> go to hallway  
(Note: This action is to return to the hallway to explore other rooms for the book and plate.)<|im_end|>
Turn 6
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a broom closet and a kitchen here.

> go to kitchen  
(Note: This action is to explore the kitchen for the book and plate.)<|im_end|>
Turn 7
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry, a hallway and a living room here.

> open cupboard  
(Note: This action is to check the cupboard for the book or plate.)<|im_end|>
Turn 8
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.

> take plate from cupboard  
(Note: This action is to take the plate, which is part of the goal.)<|im_end|>
Turn 9
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a pillow and a plate.

> go to hallway  
(Note: This action is to return to the hallway to explore other rooms for the book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 10
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a broom closet and a kitchen here.

> go to bedroom  
(Note: This action is to return to the bedroom to search for the book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 11
You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe, a shelf and a bed. The wardrobe is open. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> examine shelf  
(Note: This action is to check the shelf for the book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 12
There is nothing on the shelf.

> examine bed  
(Note: This action is to check the bed for the book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 13
There is nothing on the bed.

> go to hallway  
(Note: This action is to return to the hallway to explore other rooms for the book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 14
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a broom closet and a kitchen here.

> go to broom closet  
(Note: This action is to explore the broom closet for the book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 15
You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> examine broom closet  
(Note: This action is to thoroughly check the broom closet for the book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 16
Broomcloset is not an entity. (this should not occur.)

> examine broom  
(Note: This action is to check the broom for the book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 17
The broom is takeable. The broom is on the broomcloset1floor.

> take broom  
(Note: This action is to take the broom, which might be useful later.)<|im_end|>
Turn 18
You take the broom. In your inventory you have a pillow, a plate and a broom.

> go to hallway  
(Note: This action is to return to the hallway to explore other rooms for the book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 19
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a broom closet and a kitchen here.

> go to kitchen  
(Note: This action is to explore the kitchen again for the book.)<|im_end|>
Turn 20
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry, a hallway and a living room here.

Turn 22

(Note: This action is to take the book, which is part of the goal.)<|im_end|>

> done  
(Note: The goal has been achieved by placing the pillow on the counter, the book on the shelf, and the plate on the table.)<|im_end|>
Model produced DONE action at turn 40, end episode.
